open.title: Octotel| Kensington, Blouberg, Melkbos, Ruyterwacht
open.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Kensington, Blouberg, Melkbos, Ruyterwacht, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Technicians are currently splicing fibres to restore connectivity. We are observing most of the affected customers connectivity have restored while some services still remain down.
Technicians were unsuccessful in localising the fault. The team is currently en route to float a new cable.

Technicians continue to work on localising the fault.

No ETR is available as yet

Technicians have identified a disconnect ~5.6km from site and are en route to localise.

No ETR is available as yet

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.
